website_summaries.verdict: With a list of shoe pros stacked high against a very few cons, one might think they’ve stumbled upon the ideal footwear. The shoes are so well-constructed that there’s no rubbing from inner seams and no stiff parts that don’t flex with the feet.The leather is supple and so soft that you can wear the shoes without socks. The sneakers have a modish look that doesn’t look too casual, and the fit is just right. The footbeds are arch supportive and cushioned.
pros: Most users of Taos Union shoes agreed that these feel so incredibly comfy that walking on uneven terrain for hours does not result in pained feet
Many customers were pleased with the “sleek and hip” style of these shoes that can be worn with everything except a fancy dress
According to plenty of Taos Union reviews, the sneakers contain cushy footbeds that are arch supportive
Taos shoes don’t come cheap, but the price of the Unions is worth every penny, stated several purchasers
A handful of individuals liked how easy it was to put the shoes on and take them off
For a lot of testers, the width of the shoes is just right
A small number of consumers were amazed at the quality construction of Taos Union sneakers
The color of the high-top Taos sneakers is deep, does not fade, and does not scratch off, a few people reported
Some buyers noted that these kicks from Taos’ high-top range are true to size
cons: Some mentioned that Taos Union sneakers are well-padded except for the part where the balls of the feet are
It can get hot inside the shoes, one person said

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, True to size, Lacking in sole cushion
customer_reviews.text: If you are considering these and a regular Taos wearer you may be wondering if you need to go up a half size like the star sneakers. For me this was not necessary. I bought my regular size 9 with my fingers crossed. The length is great and matches the length of my 9.5 star sneakers. I do wish these had more padding as midway through a day of shopping I was feeling the edge of every brick I walked on. Of course with the removable footbed I may try substituting something with more cushion. The side zipper makes these easy on and off. Overall they are stylish and I’m pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and very stylish!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is a great purchase because it is simple enough to be versatile with many outfits, but the side zipper gives it a little flair. The side zipper also makes the shoe easier to put on and take off, compared to other high tops. I've received many compliments on them. The size was just right. I normally wear a size 7, and it fit like a dream in thinner merino socks.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a dream
customer_reviews.text: I have had 3 surgeries on my toe joints. I have a titanium implant so my toe doesn’t bend completely. I love the high top look but it was a major pain to us loosen and scrunch my foot to fit into a high top. I gave up until I saw these shoes. The zipper makes it possible to put on quickly and comfortably. I have 7 pair. Every color ever made! Taos is one of the BEST orthopedic shoes ever made.. they never need to be “broken in”. They are a little pricey but the comfort is so worth it. True to size every time
customer_reviews.author: Mary Cassard

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Color doesn’t look like picture shows! Very disappointed , I have many pairs of Taos , this sneakers are not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: shutzzu

customer_reviews.title: I had to go up half a size
customer_reviews.text: I urge you to go up half a size if you have a long big toe. I got the 8 but my toe was touching. The 8.5 are perfect. The color at the tip of the shoe is darker, just so you know.
customer_reviews.author: Omnivoreader

customer_reviews.title: If you have wide feet these shoes will not fit
customer_reviews.text: I loved the style of these shoes so much but my feet were too wide to zip them up. I've never worn wide shoes before so it didn't occur to me that this would be an issue. Unfortunately, wide widths are not available.
customer_reviews.author: Shann Vander Leek

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cool
customer_reviews.text: I got these for the arch support so I'd have a winter shoe that's comfy. I'm a 7-7.5 normally and got 7.5 so I'd have sock room. The top was really tight, so I went up to 8. More comfortable that size, but have more toe room than needed. After wearing for weeks, they are really comfortable and have a cool like. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Molly H.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fit
customer_reviews.text: I love the look but working the zipper is tough. You can’t easily get your foot in. Once in and zipped up my heel kept lifting up despite crushing my big toe. Very odd. I am a 7.5 but in another Taos low sneaker it took two tries to get the fit and 1/2 size larger is a huge difference. I had to buy the 8.
customer_reviews.author: MPL

customer_reviews.title: Great but wish the soles were thicker
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this shoes, but felt that the soles would wear through quickly. You can push the rubber in easily. I do a lot of walking and for this price, need my shoes to last more than a season. (Returned them)
customer_reviews.author: specialk

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this shoe for weekends, but I have been wearing it all the time! I like the way it looks with my casual outfits and I found it more comfortable than expected.
customer_reviews.author: kiki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome meeting of fashion and function
customer_reviews.text: Love these high tops! The perfect meeting of comfort and fashion. I got them in black and they work great with cut offs and black skinnies.
customer_reviews.author: Beeker

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love Taos Shoes. They fit well and are very comfortable and supportive. The problem is the color. The light tan color is not pretty and they look like plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Luci

customer_reviews.title: Nice, stylish shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes very well. They are comfortable. I really like the zippers on the sides so makes the shoes easier to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: clydeandbettylou

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a wide but not available on this style so 1/2 size larger fits fine This is my 3rd pair of Taos love them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Cute and super comfy. I live in NYC and walk A LOT. These have good arch support. Zippers are great for quick on and off.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bosworth

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable but Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I really LOVE the way this shoe looks but it is the most uncomfortable shoes I have ever worn. I have a wide foot which may be why the fit felt super snug and they high arch support was too much for me but maybe good with someone with little arch.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C.

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: I love the zip on the side easy on and off at the airport!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable right out of the box. Love Taos. These seem to have a higher arch than my other taos shoes and I’m here for it! Going to get the black soon
customer_reviews.author: Karen Erwin

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this purchase. The most comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Hyde (Bennett)

customer_reviews.title: Too, too tight
customer_reviews.text: I could hardly get the ball of my foot into the shoe. Too, too tight. I have another pair of Taos boots which really fit well. These sneakers were a disappointment and I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: KMW

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: New go to shoe! These are fantastic. I always know that I can step into a Taos and walk all day. These are no different. Now I want more.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. They are very comfortable but could use a better support insole. Love the way they look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. Great arch support and I love the zippers. So easy to get them on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: First pair was from a local shoe store and loved them so much I wanted another pair in a different color, but the shoe store only had the one color. Amazon had several to choose from. These shoes have great arch support which is so important when you have high arches. Great comfortable, casual shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne LaPalm

product_meta.title: Taos womens Union Union
product_meta.description: Do what you want, when you want with the Union high top sneaker. This sneaker offers comfort with Taos Curves & Pods removable footbed and an outside zipper to help with accessibility. Featuring unbelievably soft leather, laces for a great fit, and remarkable comfort from the padded collar, make Union into a bold new sneaker statement.
